attributes.action: Stop BBC TV Licence & introduce BBC Subscription.
attributes.additional_details:
Sky & Virgin Media provide a much better service than the BBC with their vast variety of programs & movies at a monthly fee which is agreed with their customers. 

Customers have a choice to pay or not pay for services they provide.

Unlike the BBC TV Licence which is mandatory & forceful than followed with threats of a fine if you don't have a TV Licence. 

Give the people of Britain a choice, if they want to watch the BBC enable them to buy a subscription, if not, do not force the TV Licence.
attributes.background:
I believe paying for a TV Licence is unnecessary in todays digital era.  

BBC TV Licence should be converted into a subscription based service for anyone who wishes to watch or listen to the BBC.

Most or nearly all households now pay for Virgin or Sky services.
